content:
# An error occurred while attempting to place the Stone Furnace. The error message indicates that the target position (-14.5, 26.5) is too far away from my current position (0, 0). The maximum placement distance is 10 units, and I need to move closer to the Iron Ore before placing the furnace.

# Step 52: Move closer to the Iron Ore position to enable the placement of the Stone Furnace.
move_to(Position(x=-14.5, y=26.5))  # Move to the Iron Ore position again.
